name: INFUSE
description:
The Pitch

Infuse is a PC game  (originally made for mobile), in which Titi, a young little teapot, lives a quiet life in his owner's house. But when he wants to have his tea, the little tea bags: Strawby, Limo, Minti, and Orango don't hesitate to disturb her and come and take a bath to infuse themselves. Your goal is to help Titi, to bring calm back to the living room.

Features :
  • Cute creatures everywhere!   
  • A magical and immersive world that you don’t want to leave.
  • A unique way of playing which challenge you every second. Keep putting teabags in their boxes before the smoke catchs you !
  • Musics are really catchy 
Credits : 

Music made by  Valentin Napoli
